document.heading: Board of Zoning Adjustment Confirmation Amendment Act of 1986

history.narrative: Law 6-191, the “Board of Zoning Adjustment Confirmation Amendment Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-493, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 5, 1986, and November 18, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor of November 25, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-242 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
